game.name: The Runaway Feijoão
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Runaway Feijoão is a casual indie game inspired by the old Tom & Jerry (NES) game, bringing you to difficult and addictive gameplay through the human digestive system.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Runaway Feijoão is a casual indie game inspired by the old Tom & Jerry (NES) game, bringing you to difficult and addictive gameplay through the human digestive system.

reviewHighlights.text: A fun platform game, i like that. I took a long time to get used to the gameplay, I died a lot
Rage game that is more annoying than fun. Positive reviews are crap
